channel.title: Python on An analysis of random things
channel.description: Recent content in Python on An analysis of random things

item.title: An analysis of Artsy’s twitter followers
item.description: This weekend I decided to learn more about twitter and its handy API. My subject of the analysis is Artsy, a fine-art website that provides a pandora-like service. The subjects I was curious to find out are where their followers are from, what their twitter activities are like, what other interests they have, and, specifically, what kind of stereotypes clusters they fall into because, you know, it’s important and I didn’t have anything better to do.
